<br> <br> <br> **INTRODUCTION**

</center>

<br> 
  Thepsatri Rajabhat University has been organizing an international competition since 2013, starting from an international English speech contest, in which more than 40 contestants from ASEAN countries cordially participated. Furthermore, an international academic conference, an international forum on "Local Development", and a cultural exchange among participating universities from Thailand, Malaysia as well as Indonesia were, in the following years, successfully organized, respectively. Realizing the importance of partnerships at both national and global levels so as to strengthen academic cooperation, considered as a whole as advantageous to staff and students, and such awareness of cultural harmonies, Thepsatri Rajabhat University (Thailand) in collaboration with Universiti Teknologi Mara Kedah Branch (Malaysia), Universitas Sarjanawiyata Tamansiswa (Indonesia), Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (Vietnam), and Universitas PGRI Adi Buana Surabaya (Indonesia) is organizing the 4th International Academic & Cultural Exchange 2021 (Online) on August 19th -- 20th, 2021, aiming to authentically widen and promote students' and staff's knowledge as well as expertise in terms of education, economy, technology, culture, and other essential related areas.

  The 4th International Academic & Cultural Exchange 2021 (Online) comprises Online International English Impromptu Speech Contest, Online International Idea Pitching Competition, and Online International Conference on "Teaching and Learning in New Normality: A Key to Empower Teacher Towards Sustainable Education", which all interested individuals can freely select according to their fields of study and interests.
